result.arabic_text: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَبۡلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحۡسِنِينَ
result.translation: Maze bakirane urweze n’akanyamuneza, impano bahawe n’Imana yabo Rurema Allah, mu vy’ukuri n’imbere yuko bahabwa nya mpano, bahora ari abagwaneza mu bugamburutsi bwabo kw’isi;
